So the long-awaited KSP products for us to have and hold are out here! I can say that Im both happy, and hoping. Happy that we can proudly wear Kerbals on our chest, but hoping that more is on its way (not disappointed, dont get me wrong).

I havent seen anything to suggest that more is on its way, but I havent seen anything saying the opposite either, so I would like to jot down some realistic suggestions that I'd like to see if more products are on their way

1st. More color choices: Id like most to see the flag-planting t-shirt in black or a dark grey

2nd. More shirts: The flag-planting is a great start, but I hope that more designs are on their way. KSP could produce a wealth of shirt-worthy graphics

To name a few, maybe the old loading graphic (I think a 3rd party produced that, so thats permission-sensitive), our old friend the launch tower, or a

(semi) successful landing on the Mun

3rd. Hoodies! Hooded sweatshirts with similar graphics to the t-shirts would be something Id spend on

Any more suggestions, or discussion on the matter? Go!

There's already a post about this.

But as I said there, I don't really like most of the stuff available.

Things I really want are stuff with the loading screen art, and a Jebediah plushie.

I'd like some female fitted clothes personally.

I don't like t-shirts that don't really fit my body.
I personally think black would look nicer. Dat Mug! I might have it
getting the coffee mug (larg one) and a new mouse pad. my poor Marvin Martian pad is 15 years old and ready to retire

I don't like t-shirts that don't really fit my body.

Was last time I sold on cafepress. It's, like, 30 seconds work they have to do so we can give them our money.
The t-shirt I would like is one with just the kerbal space program logo, like the mouse mat and coffee cup ones.

Why do we think the items they offer right now are so limited? Maybe it was a trial run to see what the reaction is before they either trash the project or expand? Either way, I hope they did click off those little options and start offering more. Black is my color for t-shirts, like lots of others on this thread

That loading screen is pretty sweet, I'd probably buy a shirt with that
I would like to see a KSP travel mug. I collect those.

I definitely am interested in getting the Jeb IVA 3D printed model, but I'll have to look at the quality of the 3D printing before plopping down some cash for it. 2x more than what the game cost me. I hope Squad gets some of it too.
I would really, really, really like to see some Kerbonaut plushies. With removable helmets!
I want the 3d statues for Jeb, Bob and Bill but I have to wait to see how one looks. Then I'll drop the cash for them if I think they are worth it.

But Imagine this... (Sticks to your car dashboard)

As a 3D RCS or SAS button with a toggleable LED inside

Someone needs to make this on shapeways already
I keep track of all my flights in a logbook. I've been shopping around for a good space-themed notebook with little success. A kerbal themed flight logbook would be really cool.
Where is my business casual embroidred polo!?
Bobble heads and a 3 kerbal moon shirt. I would buy both.

I got my mug today. Packaging was just a thick styrofoam box, but it held up very well to shipment. Mug was so snug in it I practically had to break the styrofoam to get it.

Wish I could get one in (near) black. Would also like more images to choose from (Jeb riding a booster, a rocket taking off with a part blowing up ...), but I'm very happy with this, and can't wait to fill it up with some rocket fuel tomorrow morning!
